object.name: Mario
object.extra: It's-a me, Mario!

object.name: Goomba
object.extra: The most generic npc in video game history!

bool.name: Move when Mario's not around
bool.info: Move when outside the camera's view

bool.name: Drop +10s
bool.info: Add 10 seconds instead of dropping a coin

object.name: Chain Chomp
object.extra: Mario world's second best dog-acting creature.

object.name: Toad
object.extra: An anthropomorphic mushroom from the mushroom kingdom, the loyalest to the princess Peach!

bool.name: Is jumping
bool.info: Determines whether toad is jumping or not

int.name: Star coin id
int.info: ID of the starcoin dropped by toad if told to do so by Object to spawn

bool.name: Has propeller
bool.info: Determines whether toad spawns with a propeller suit or not

object.name: Dandelion
object.extra: A dandelion found in a lot of levels, has different colour options and can spawn powerups

option.name: Colour
option.info: If you select the red option after getting an item it won't blow away

option.name: Object to spawn
option.info: Object to spawn when the dandelion is blown away

option.name: Spawn direction
option.info: Direction for the object to spawn

object.name: Tightrope
object.extra: A tightrope Mario can walk across and jump on.

option.name: RopeStartModel
option.info: Sets the model used at the start of the rope

option.name: EndRopeModel
option.info: Sets the model for the end of the rope

int.name: Shadow size
int.info: Determines how big the shadow will be (or if it will have at all)

object.name: Flagpole
object.extra: The iconic flagpole.

bool.name: Play SMB theme
bool.info: Plays the SMB level complete theme instead of the regular end thme

object.name: Checkpoint Flag
object.extra: A checkpoint that activates when Mario touches it, and will respawn him there after dying.

int.name: Mario Start Id
int.info: If you want the player to spawn on a specific Mario object, use its Mario Id here, otherwise it will use the closest Mario object it can find.

object.name: Tree
object.extra: Something that Mario can climb on.

option.name: Object to spawn
option.info: Item that spawns when ontop of tree

object.name: Yellow Moving Platform 3x3
object.extra: A 3x3 platform that moves with a child.

bool.name: Shadow size
bool.info: Casts a shadow underneath the platform

object.name: Star Medal
object.extra: A collectable item.

option.name: Star Medal No.
option.info: Determines what star medal you collect

bool.name: Follow Platform?
bool.info: Makes the Star Medal follow a platform.

object.name: Swinging Spike Ball
object.extra: A spike ball that swings in the air.

int.name: Swing Speed
int.info: Changes how fast the ball moves

object.name: Winged Biddybuds
object.extra: Winged Biddybuds

object.name: Bouncy Platform2x2
object.extra: we did this in minecraft I THINK

object.name: ViewCtrlArea
object.extra: Force load objects depending on Arg no.

int.name: ID
int.info: ID that is used for object's ViewID

object.name: Green Panel Switch
object.extra: A switch that activates green panels.

object.name: 3 Coin Long Question Block
object.extra: A long block that gives 3 coins upon being hit.

object.name: 1 Coin Brick Block
object.extra: A brick that gives 1 coin upon being hit.

object.name: 10 Coin Question Block
object.extra: A block that gives 10 coin upon being hit.

object.name: 1 Coin Question Block
object.extra: A block that gives 1 coin upon being hit.

object.name: Fire Flower Question Block
object.extra: A block that gives a Fire Flower upon being hit.

object.name: 10 Coin Long Question Block
object.extra: A long block that gives 10 coins upon being hit.

object.name: Tanooki Leaf Question Block
object.extra: A block that gives a Tanooki Leaf upon being hit.

object.name: 1 Coin Wooden Crate
object.extra: A wooden crate when broken gives 1 coin.

object.name: 10 Coin Brick Block
object.extra: A brick that gives 10 coin upon being hit.

object.name: Wooden Crate
object.extra: A wooden crate.

object.name: Wide Noteblock
object.extra: A block that makes Mario jump up!

bool.name: Keep Momentum
bool.info: Momentum is kept when jumping on the block

object.name: Boomerang Question Block
object.extra: A block that gives a Boomerang Flower upon being hit.

object.name: Long Boomerang Question Block
object.extra: A long Block that gives a Boomerang Flower upon being hit.

object.name: Biddybuds
object.extra: Winged Biddybuds
